## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-13.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-13.5, 23.5) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Boiler at position (-10.5, 21.0) (Status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) (Status: WORKING)

### Pipe Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Underground Pipe at position (-9.5, 23.5)
- Underground Pipe at position (-7.5, 23.5)
- Underground Pipe at position (-10.5, 22.5)
- Pipe Group at position (-5.5, 16.5) (Status: EMPTY)
- Pipe Group at position (-10.5, 23.5) (Status: EMPTY)
- Pipe Group at position (-9.5, 23.5) (Status: FULL_OUTPUT)
- Pipe Group at position (-7.5, 23.5) (Status: EMPTY)
- Pipe Group at position (-5.5, 24.5) (Status: EMPTY)
- Pipe Group at position (-4.5, 16.5) (Status: EMPTY)
- Pipe Group at position (-4.5, 24.5) (Status: EMPTY)

### Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) (Status: NO_INGREDIENTS)

### Electricity Group
- Electricity Group at position (-3.67, 20.21) (Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Pipes
- Ensure there is no existing object in the way before placing a pipe-to-ground. Check the target location for obstacles.
- Avoid placing pipe-to-ground where the entity footprint overlaps with water. Choose a different location to avoid overlap.
- Ensure you have the necessary pipes in your inventory before attempting to place them.

### Connection Errors
- Verify that the underground pipes are correctly aligned and within connection range before attempting to connect them.

### Ingredient Shortages
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients to function. Check the inventory and supply the required materials.

### Electricity Network Issues
- Connect the electricity group to the electric network to ensure it is plugged in and functional.
